name: signet.js
description: A TypeScript library for handling multi-chain transactions and signatures using Signet MPC

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && npm run build:browser && npm run build:node && npm run build:post && cp package.json README.md LICENSE dist/
scripts.build:post: mkdir -p dist/types && cp dist/node/index.d.ts dist/node/index.d.cts dist/types/ && rm dist/node/index.d.ts dist/node/index.d.cts
scripts.pre:deploy: npm run build && npm run docs:build
scripts.publish-npm: npm run pre:deploy && cd dist && npm publish
scripts.publish-npm:beta: npm run pre:deploy && cd dist && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch --no-git-tag-version --force && npm run publish-npm
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor --no-git-tag-version --force && npm run publish-npm
scripts.release:major: npm version major --no-git-tag-version --force && npm run publish-npm
scripts.release:beta: npm version prerelease --preid=beta --no-git-tag-version --force && npm run publish-npm:beta
scripts.test: pnpm exec hardhat node --config hardhat.config.mts & sleep 2 && vitest run && pkill -f hardhat
scripts.test:watch: pnpm exec hardhat node --config hardhat.config.mts & sleep 2 && vitest --watch
scripts.test:ci: pnpm exec hardhat node --config hardhat.config.mts & NODE_PID=$!; sleep 2 && vitest run; kill $NODE_PID

author: Sig Network
